text:
Hi all,

I am developing a public app which adds a custom CRM card for each deal record. I explored <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/crm-development-tools>.

I could not find how to add this to a public app. Is this only for private apps for now?

Thanks
Hi, it's only for private apps at the moment

Thanks.
Another query - I wanted to add a crm card like the sales navigator linkedin app which will render an iframe inside the crm card.
Could not find how to do it. Is it in some kind of private beta program?
